name: Keith Bloom
body:
I am a lead developer with over 20 years experience of creating business class enterprise software. My main focus is C#, the .Net platform and JavaScript. When writing software I use Test Driven Development backed up by Continuous Integration. I am keenly interested in creating robust software which is fit for the purpose. To do this, I follow the SOLID guidelines for OO design and I release quickly and often. My love of computing started when I was 8 years old when I wrote an adventure game on my ZX81. I loved that I could program a computer and create a game. Creating software is still my passion. I love learning, and my current interest is in functional programming and writing programs in Haskell, F# and Scala.
